WorkItem.ClosedComment: Thank you for the code sample.
WorkItem.Description:
Hello, Greg Schechter and Gerhard Schneider. Thanks for your good job.
 
I rewrote your ShaderBuildTask project by using my ID3DXEffectCompiler managed wrapper, which is fully written in C#.
I attached the code.
 
This implementation have reflection capability like Managed DirectX's Effect class.
Such capability is useful when you generate C# code from HLSL files.
I can offer my managed wrapper under Ms-PL.
